body.content:
I am Mrs. Mary josen from Northern
Ireland, 68 years old, I'm married to Mr. Daniel josen. who was a
contractor with the government of Ivory Coast for eleven years before he
died in the year 2014 after a brief illness that lasted only four days, We
were married for twenty seven years without any child,

Dear I contact you to let you know my desire to donate to you the sum of
4,500,000.00 EURO which I inherited from my late husband. It is my desire
to see that this money is invested in any organization of your choice in
your country and distributed every year to charities, motherless baby
homes, schools, support for homeless men and women or Whatever you have in
mind. that will be for the benefit of the less fortunate.

Presently i was very sick at point of death due to cancer sickness and the
one that disturbs me most is my stroke sickness, Recently my doctor said
that I will not last for the next four months so I took this decision
because i don't have any child that will inherit this money even if i die
and I don't want this fund to be invested in ungodly way.


 I sent this email to you with the help of my private female nurse.

My condition is really deteriorating day by day and it is really
giving me lots to think about. which makes me an unhappy woman, This has
prompted my decision to donate all I have for charity;  After going through
your profile,

Therefore as soon as I receive your response confirming your acceptance to
work as I directed, I will give all relevant information that will
authorize the release and transfer of the money to you as my duly assigned
representative.

Assured me that you will act accordingly as I said in this message, hoping
to receive your response soon,

your sister,
Mrs, Mary josen

header.subject: PLEASE ENDEAVOR TO USE IT FOR THE ORPHANAGE CHILDREN.
